cu.explanation_en: Setting mac_log_level to an invalid value will cause MAC layer logging configuration errors and prevent proper MAC event logging.

du.explanation_en: Setting mac_log_level to an invalid value will cause MAC layer logging configuration errors and prevent proper MAC event logging.
du.explanation_zh: 將 mac_log_level 設定為無效值會導致 MAC 層日誌配置錯誤，並阻止正確的 MAC 事件日誌記錄。
